page.title: 04Electricity comes to Unapool
page.content: Electricity arrived in July,1981. By that time I was six years old. We used to have paraffin lamps, Gas lamps and candles which we bought in Lochinver, a small village about 29km away. If we ran out of paraffin, gas or candles we spent the night in the dark! Before we had electricity I had my own candle which I would light when I wanted to leave the kitchen. It was early to bed in the wintertime. Now my mother has many electrical appliances to help with the housework_ a washing machine, tumble dryer, iron, dish_washer, hair dryer etc. My father has escaped the morning task of filling lamps. I can use my computer and can read till all hours. My bedtime is much later now in the Winter now.
